Details

Niagara Nutrition Partners is a region-wide initiative that provides the community with opportunities to develop and co-ordinate breakfast, lunch, or snack programs in schools and other venues. To date, Niagara Nutrition Partners supports over 200 programs at 135 sites in Niagara, giving kids an equal opportunity to learn and thrive.;14 North Street P.O. Box 575;905-984-8953
